short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows your salesforce sandbox version next to your sandbox host

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of having to manually look at what version your sandboxes are?  Well, let a computer do all that tedious work for you!  This extension will load an icon and alt text next to your instance name so you can see if the sandbox is a spring/summer/winter instance.
